targetAudience: Read 3-5 books in 30 days. Perfect for those who 'want to read more' but spend hours scrolling instead.
scientificRationale: The average person reads less than 1 book per year, yet spends 2.5 hours daily on social media. By swapping 30 minutes of scrolling for reading for 30 days, you'll complete 3-5 books and experience measurable cognitive benefits: improved vocabulary, focus, empathy, and reduced stress. Research shows that just 6 minutes of reading reduces stress by 68%. This is simple habit substitution with massive ROI.

weekByWeekBreakdown.focus: 15 pages daily (20-30 min). Replace evening scrolling with reading. Social media limit: 1 hour. Track daily completion.
20 pages daily. Social media down to 45 min. Notice improved focus and sleep (reading before bed vs scrolling).
25 pages daily. First book completed (~200-250 pages). Sense of accomplishment. Pick next book immediately.
30 pages daily. Social media optional, not compulsive. 2nd book done. Reading is now favorite part of day.

successMetrics: By day 30, you'll have read 3-5 books (600-900 pages), read 20-30 pages daily automatically, reduced social media use by 50-75%, experience measurably improved focus and vocabulary, sleep better, and genuinely identify as 'a reader.' NooLife 30-day reading finishers report an average of 4.2 books completed and 68% reduction in social media time.
